link.title: Whittemore-Prescott Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Per EO-2020-35 from Gov. Whitmer, school is closed for the reminder of the year. We understand there are many questions as to what happens next. Check back regularly, we will be posting information as it becomes available.

div.p: The mission of the Whittemore-Prescott Area SchoolCommunity is to produce citizens who can effectively communicate, gather and use information, and make responsible life decisions.
Make Whittemore-Prescott Area Schools Your School District of Choice.
